roleset.name: Fall or slip back into a previous state

role.descr: previous state, usually prepositional complement, relapsed into what?

example.name: Arg 1 only, adjectival
example.text: Aren't the Islamic principles and religious precepts which this relapsed person has made fun of of value to you?

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: After John took her home from rehab, Mary relapsed into the desperate world of crystal meth.
example.arg: After John took her home from rehab
into the desperate world of crystal meth

predicate.note: Frames file for 'relapse' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry.
